mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKMARKED_FEEDS WHERE FOLDER_ID = #{folder_id}

SELECT BF.FOLDER_ID AS folder_id ,BF.FEED_ID AS feed_id ,TO_CHAR(BF.BOOKMARK_INDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS bookmark_indate ,FD.PAGE_FILE AS preview FROM BOOKMARKED_FEEDS BF, FEED_DRAWINGS FD WHERE FOLDER_ID = #{int} AND FD.FEED_ID = BF.FEED_ID AND FUNC_SPLIT(FD.PAGE_FILE, '--divide--', 1) = '1.png' ORDER BY BF.BOOKMARK_INDATE DESC
